title: The Mermaid's Gift
description: Bonnie Campbell is back is back on Mermaid Island. She can hardly wait to visit her favorite places and see her friends, Bobbie and Moonie. But all is not well on the island. Search boats seeking a long-lost shipwreck are anchoring in the quiet waters off Yeoman's Beach. Will they discover the secret Bonnie has tried so hard to protect? Read more about Bonnie and her friends in: "The Secret of Mermaid Island" and "Mermaid Dreams" both by Judith Wade.
author: Judith Wade
